Author: fatalButterfly
Text: Agreed... I keep picturing the strawberry hard candies but they should be about the same unless the size is drastically different. Anyway... if most chocolates (like in a box of chocolates or a fun sized candy bar depending) are about 50 cals each then it's fair to say a hard candy which is mostly sugar (so same as the chocolates but without the fat, etc) it should be less than that.

Author: littlelivethings
Text: The tiny Russian kind or the slightly bigger ones? Either way somewhere between 10 and 20. They are all sugar and no fat
